name: Touhou Luna Nights
description: Touhou Luna Night's is a 2D search action (Metroidvania) video game. After creating many action games, this is a new project from Team Ladybug.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL compliant video card Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL compliant video card Storage: 1 GB available space
